text:
e="preserve">Teddington is a suburban area in the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames. It is in south west London, on the north bank of the River Thames, between Hampton Wick and Twickenham. It stretches inland from the River Thames to Bushy Park.
Formerly, it was in the county of Middlesex, which was in its postal county until they were abolished in 1996.
Road.
The A309, A310, A313 and B358 roads pass through Teddington.
Bus.
The 33, 281, 285, 481, R68, X26 and N33 bus routes pass through Teddington.

annotations.surface_form: London Borough of Richmond upon Thames
Formerly, it was in the county
